product-insight-telemetry-via-server-kno.userFacingName: Product Insight Telemetry via Server Knobs - Rollout - Release
product-insight-telemetry-via-server-kno.userFacingDescription: Testing out the data and insights capture in the awesome bar.

address-autofill-desktop-pref-release-ro.userFacingName: Address Autofill Desktop ( Pref, Release Rollout )

encrypted-client-hello-fallback-mechanis.userFacingDescription: This experiment enables a fallback mechanism for Encrypted Client Hello. This feature maximizes compatibility with websites that have misconfigured or unexpected DNS configurations.

fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2.userFacingDescription: Enable sending the Fx Accounts ping.

unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingName: Unified API for spocs and top sites - controlled rollout for release 133+
unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingDescription: We're switching to a new endpoint for the services supplying sponsored content and top sites to the new tab. This is a controlled rollout for 133 on the Release channel to that new endpoint.

long-term-holdback-2025h1-growth-desktop.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for 2025 H1 Growth experiments

fox-doodle-multi-action-cta-2025-rollout.userFacingDescription: Rollout: Setting Firefox as primary browser

$l10n.text: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

$l10n.text: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingName: PDF Annotations - Highlight - Treatment B Rollout
pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message in the PDF viewer that introduces the highlight toolbar button, and offers users a way to set Firefox as the default PDF handler, if it is not already.

de.screen-1-header: Hervorhebung in PDFs ist ab sofort möglich!
de.screen-2-subtitle: Sie haben jedes Mal Zugriff auf unsere Werkzeuge, wenn Sie eine PDF-Datei öffnen.
de.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Mit unserem neuen Textmarker-Werkzeug können Sie PDFs an einem Ort lesen und bearbeiten.

fr.screen-1-header: Vous pouvez désormais surligner vos PDF !
fr.screen-2-header: Faire de Firefox votre éditeur PDF par défaut ?
fr.screen-2-subtitle: Vous aurez accès à nos outils à chaque fois que vous ouvrirez un fichier PDF.
fr.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Avec notre nouvel outil de surlignage, vous pouvez consulter et modifier des fichiers PDF sans avoir besoin d’un autre logiciel.

it.screen-1-header: Ora puoi evidenziare i tuoi PDF!
it.screen-2-header: Impostare Firefox come editor predefinito per i PDF?
it.screen-2-subtitle: Avrai accesso ai nostri strumenti ogni volta che apri un PDF.
it.feature-tour-submenu-item-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Grazie al nuovo strumento evidenziatore puoi leggere e modificare i PDF senza bisogno di altri software.

en-CA.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-CA.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-CA.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-CA.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

en-GB.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-GB.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-GB.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-GB.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

en-US.screen-1-header: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
en-US.screen-2-header: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
en-US.screen-2-subtitle: You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
en-US.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.

content.promoTitle: VPNs aren’t all the same. Some simply aren’t secure. Some log your activity. But Mozilla VPN is different — it’s open source and backed by a company with a track record of putting people and their privacy first.

mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-treatmen.userFacingName: Mozilla VPN in Private Browsing - Treatment D Rollout (EN only)
mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-treatmen.userFacingDescription:
This is a rollout for the most successful treatment of the Mozilla VPN messaging experiment on PBM (Treatment D):
https://experimenter.services.mozilla.com/nimbus/mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing/

This rollout is English only and will be followed by another rollout for German, French and Italian:
https://experimenter.services.mozilla.com/nimbus/mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-de-fr-it-copy/

device-migration-accounts-toolbar-icon-r.userFacingName: Device Migration Accounts Toolbar Icon  - Rollout
device-migration-accounts-toolbar-icon-r.userFacingDescription: Experiment: Updating the Accounts toolbar icon

$l10n.text: You’re signed out. Click the Account icon to sign in.
$l10n.comment: The 'account icon' is the toolbar button with a 'profile' icon of a human head/shoulders. It's for dealing with your Mozilla account. When hovering the icon, the tooltip says 'Account'

login-status-advisory-callout-rollout.userFacingDescription: Adds a tooltip notification indicating the Mozilla account login status for users who may think they are signed in, but are actually signed out.

de.login-status-advisory-title-a: Sie sind abgemeldet. Klicken Sie auf das Kontosymbol, um sich anzumelden.
de.login-status-advisory-title-b: Beginnen Sie mit der Synchronisation Ihrer Daten. Klicken Sie auf das Kontosymbol, um sich anzumelden.

fr.login-status-advisory-title-a: Votre compte est déconnecté. Cliquez sur l’icône de compte pour vous connecter.
fr.login-status-advisory-title-b: Commencez à synchroniser vos données. Cliquez sur l’icône de compte pour vous connecter.

en-CA.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-CA.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

en-GB.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-GB.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

en-US.login-status-advisory-title-a: You’re signed out. Click the account icon to sign in.
en-US.login-status-advisory-title-b: Start syncing your data. Click the account icon to sign in.

upgraded-sidebar-138-broad-rollout.userFacingDescription: This experiment introduces the sidebar toolbar button to the users' interface.

chips-rollout-to-firefox.userFacingDescription: Deploy the Partitioned cookie parameter to users

custom-wallpapers-no-message-rollout-rel.userFacingName: Custom Wallpapers, No Message Rollout - Release
custom-wallpapers-no-message-rollout-rel.userFacingDescription: Rollout the Custom Wallpaper feature without Messaging in Release channel

value.spocPlacements: newtab_stories_1, newtab_stories_2, newtab_stories_3, newtab_stories_4, newtab_stories_5, newtab_stories_6

spoc-positions-and-placements-rollout.userFacingDescription: For spocs and rectangle, we will update placements so they're received at once by downstream systems

storage-access-heuristic-restriction-rol.userFacingDescription: We are trying to grant fewer websites exceptions to third-party storage partitioning. We are trying this on a small fraction of users to see if it affects whether or not websites break.

desktop-release-rollout-show-relay-to-al.userFacingName: Desktop Release Rollout: Show Relay to all Browsers - "Next" Sign-up modal CTA
desktop-release-rollout-show-relay-to-al.userFacingDescription: Firefox Relay lets you hide your real email address to keep your identity safe. This study looks at how people use Relay in the Firefox browser on their computer.

report-this-ad.userFacingDescription: Implementing a feature to allow users to report objectionable ads to Mozilla.

1-callout-contextual-chatbot-suggestion-.userFacingName: 1-Callout Contextual Chatbot Suggestion Treatment A: Tab Switching Copy Rollout
1-callout-contextual-chatbot-suggestion-.userFacingDescription: Provide contextual suggestions for users who visit an AI chatbot website.

disable-enrollment-status-telemetry-for-.userFacingName: Disable Enrollment Status Telemetry for Firefox Desktop (via nimbusTelemetry)

one-click-sponsored-settings.userFacingDescription: Allow users to disable New Tab's sponsored settings in one click

fast-udp-for-firefox-treatment-fast-udp-.userFacingName: Fast UDP for Firefox - Treatment Fast UDP Release Rollout
fast-udp-for-firefox-treatment-fast-udp-.userFacingDescription: Fast UDP for Firefox's QUIC HTTP3 I/O.

enforce-crlite-results-and-limit-use-of-.userFacingDescription: CRLite is a privacy-preserving tool for checking the revocation status of TLS certificates. This rollout disables OCSP in favor of CRLite for most certificates.

hide-descriptions-on-newtab-articles-140.userFacingName: Hide descriptions on newtab articles 140 max - US Rollout

$l10n.comment: Callout title prompting users to back up bookmarks

Primary button label that routes to accounts.firefox.com

account-adoption-callout-bookmarks.userFacingDescription: Prompt Firefox account creation after an action.

de.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-ti: Holen Sie sich Ihre Lieblings-Websites in Sekunden
de.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-su: Synchronisieren Sie sofort alle Ihre Lesezeichen auf einem anderen Gerät.
de.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-backup-: Schützen Sie Ihre Lesezeichen, indem Sie diese verschlüsselt mit Ihren Geräten synchronisieren.

fr.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-ti: Récupérez vos sites préférés en une seconde
fr.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-su: Synchronisez instantanément tous vos marque-pages sur un autre appareil.
fr.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-backup-: Protégez vos marque-pages en les synchronisant sur vos appareils de façon chiffrée.

it.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-ti: Accedi ai tuoi siti preferiti in un attimo
it.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-backup-: Facciamo un backup dei tuoi segnalibri
it.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-su: Sincronizza al volo tutti i tuoi segnalibri su un altro dispositivo.
it.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-backup-: Proteggi i tuoi segnalibri sincronizzandoli con i tuoi dispositivi usando la crittografia.

en-CA.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-ti: Get your favorite sites in a sec
en-CA.fxa-adoption-bookmarks-treatment-sync-su: Instantly sync all your bookmarks on another device.
